snippet.title: MOAR - Appeteaser - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming on July 21
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2074490/MOAR__Appeteaser/

💛 MOAR - Appeteaser is a glimpse of what the games big sister Mayhem on a Rainbow - VR is going to offer.

💛 It contains sandbox game modes and levels from the game mentioned above.

💛 It focuses on the wave and arena shooter aspect in which you will fight of a horde of various zombies with different kind of ranged and melee weapons. You can collect points to unlock new guns, levels and power ups. It is an easy going fun in which you can jump in any time and enjoy a bit of mayhem.
